messages.content: Hello there! I need a tagline for a game design document i'm making about "Beyond Heroes" a FPS RTS World War 2 game based on "Heroes and Generals" (a spiritual successor). I want the tagline to include the game title in a innovative way
How about: "Unleash the ultimate World War 2 battlefield with 'Beyond Heroes: A FPS RTS Experience'"?
I want a shorter, more striking tagline
How about: "Beyond Heroes: The ultimate WW2 battlefield awaits"
I don't want the title to appear as a standalone thing
How about: "Beyond Heroes: The ultimate WW2 battle unfolds" or "Beyond Heroes: WW2 like never before"
